creator: jbullock@e-net.com.mx
text:
I cannot start TC 5.0.9 as a service.

I recieve the message:

Cannot start Apache tomcat service in local machine.

Error 1053: Tehe service has not responded to the petition or started the 
control in adecuate time.

This works for me. You likely have an incorrect JDK setup. Please do not reopen
the report.
creator: remm@apache.org
jbullock@e-net.com.mx
text: If I have an incorrect JDK setup. Why does it work when I run the startup.bat?

creator: remm@apache.org
text: You probably didn't specify the right JDK directory when you ran the installer.

I had this problem in 5.0.14 and installing the public JRE fixed it. I think 
the NT service requires registered Java components(vs. private JRE of the JDK).
creator: hnjunk@stltntt.org
